about.heading: About Our Clinic
about.intro: Founded in 2013 by Dr. Deepa Singh, True Rays Neuro Rehab Physiotherapy Center has been serving the community with expert care in Mayur Vihar Phase 3. We specialize in neurological, musculoskeletal, and developmental rehabilitation, offering advanced physiotherapy services tailored to each patient's needs. Our dedicated team is committed to helping every individual regain mobility, improve function, and achieve lasting recovery.
about.imgAlt: Human brain scan in a neurology clinic
about.ourApproachDesc: We believe in a holistic approach to rehabilitation, combining evidence-based treatments with personalized care plans tailored to each patient's unique needs and goals.
about.personalizedCareDesc: Custom treatment plans designed for your specific condition and recovery goals.
about.expertTeamDesc: Highly qualified professionals with extensive experience in neurology and other rehabilitation.
about.ourMissionDesc: To provide comprehensive, compassionate, and cutting-edge neurological rehabilitation services that empower our patients to regain independence, improve their quality of life, and achieve their personal recovery goals through evidence-based treatment approaches.

cards.callToAction: Experience the blend of ancient wisdom and modern care.
